abstract: Collection of Arabic and Persian texts, mainly on law and logic.
contents: 1. leaves 1b-28a: Mīzān al-maqādīr fī tibyān al-taqādīr / Aghā Raḍī al-Dīn.
2. leaves 29a-108b: [Khulāṣat al-ḥisāb with Persian translation and commentary] / Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī.
3. leaves 109b-152a: [Alfīyah fī farḍ al-ṣalāh al-yawmīyah] / al-Shahīd al-Awwal.
5. leaves 223b-227b: [al-Risālah al-kubrá fī al-manṭiq] / al-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī.
6. leaves 228b-236b: [al-Ghurrah fī al-manṭiq] / Ibn al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī.
extent: 245 leaves : paper ; 186 x 106-125 (117-165 x 49-101) mm bound to 186 x 129 mm
provenance: On leaf 1a, owners' stamp and notes, one of which is dated 1276 H.
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding_note: Limp golden-brown leather with blind-stamped fillets.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
